語りかける: (かたりかける) - to make a speech; to address
語りつくす: (かたりつくす) - to say everything one wants to say; to exhaust a topic
語りつぐ: (かたりつぐ) - to transmit; to hand down
語りべ: (かたりべ) - (professional) storyteller; hereditary role of narrator in early imperial court
語り伝える: (かたりつたえる) - to hand down; to pass on (story or tradition)
語り口: (かたりくち) - way of reciting; way of telling a story
語り古す: (かたりふるす) - to say repeatedly (often by many people); to say over and over again
語り句: (かたりく) - story/tale; unaccompanied part of the Heike Monogatari chanting
語り尽くす: (かたりつくす) - to say everything one wants to say; to exhaust a topic
語り尽す: (かたりつくす) - to say everything one wants to say; to exhaust a topic
語り掛ける: (かたりかける) - to make a speech; to address
語り明かす: (かたりあかす) - to talk all the night
語り継ぐ: (かたりつぐ) - to transmit; to hand down
語り部: (かたりべ) - (professional) storyteller; hereditary role of narrator in early imperial court
語る: (かたる) - to talk about/to speak of/to tell/to narrate; to recite/to chant; to indicate/to show
語るに落ちる: (かたるにおちる) - to let slip a secret; to let the cat out of the bag
語るに足る: (かたるにたる) - to be worth telling; to be worth confiding in
語を強める: (ごをつよめる) - to put stress on a word
語を結ぶ: (ごをむすぶ) - to conclude one's speech
語例: (ごれい) - example of a word or phrase
語原: (ごげん) - word root; word derivation; etymology
語史: (ごし) - dictionary giving etymology and describing historical changes in meaning and usage
語否定: (ごひてい) - constituent negation; word negation
語呂あわせ: (ごろあわせ) - rhyming game; play on words; pun
語呂合せ: (ごろあわせ) - rhyming game; play on words; pun
語呂合わせ: (ごろあわせ) - rhyming game; play on words; pun
語学の力: (ごがくのちから) - one's linguistic ability
語学の才: (ごがくのさい) - talent for languages
語学学習: (ごがくがくしゅう) - language study; language learning
語尾: (ごび) - (inflected) end of a word; end of a sentence
語幹: (ごかん) - stem; root of a word
語幹形成: (ごかんけいせい) - formed from a stem
語幹形成母音: (ごかんけいせいぼおん) - thematic; thematic vowel
語彙力: (ごいりょく) - (the extent of) one's vocabulary
語彙機能文法: (ごいきのうぶんぽう) - lexical-functional grammar; LFG
語彙的コントロールの原理: (ごいてきコントロールのげんり) - principle of lexical control; PLC
語形変化: (ごけいへんか) - inflection of words (e.g. declension of nouns and conjugation of verbs)
語志: (ごし) - dictionary giving etymology and describing historical changes in meaning and usage
語感: (ごかん) - sense of language; feeling of a word/impression a word makes/nuance
語末: (ごまつ) - end of a word; suffix
語構成記憶装置: (ごこうせいきおくそうち) - word organized storage
語気を弱める: (ごきをよわめる) - to soften one's voice
語気を強める: (ごきをつよめる) - to raise one's voice; to lift one's voice; to speak emphatically
語法: (ごほう) - diction; grammar; syntax; usage; wording
語派: (ごは) - branch of languages (i.e. Italic languages as a subset of Indo-European languages)
語源: (ごげん) - word root; word derivation; etymology
語種: (ごしゅ) - classification of Japanese words by their origin as Japanese, Chinese or Western
語素: (ごそ) - word root (the smallest portion of a larger word that holds meaning)
語群: (ごぐん) - group of languages (i.e. the Romance languages, considered as a subset of the Italic languages); group of words
語誌: (ごし) - dictionary giving etymology and describing historical changes in meaning and usage
語調: (ごちょう) - tone (of voice); note; accent
語路合せ: (ごろあわせ) - rhyming game; play on words; pun
語路合わせ: (ごろあわせ) - rhyming game; play on words; pun
語部: (かたりべ) - (professional) storyteller; hereditary role of narrator in early imperial court
語釈: (ごしゃく) - interpretation of a word
